title: Group Booking Module
description: Redesigned the user journey and flow of the Group Booking module. Converted the offline process of adding add-ons and bookings venues to an online process by implementing the same in the Quotation generation flow.
result: Reduced the steps required to generate quotations by approx 38% resulting in faster quotation generation with Add-ons and venues.
challenges: Digitizing the excel based process of venue booking and communicating the benefits to the stakeholders.

title: Mobile Application
description: Built the new mobile application with CMS integration for seamless content management and dynamic updates. Redesigned the UI/UX to enhance user engagement and interactivity. Added new features to the booking management.
result: Improved in app manage booking options that helps in reducing the manual process. Improved navigation for the users. On cruise activities data provided to users on the App.
challenges: User journey issue with the Update guest details flow.

title: Multi-PO Invoice
description: Designed solution for Multi-po invoicing with invoice reconciliation. This feature would allow clients to create a single invoice from multiple purchase orders while including the invoice reconciliation process for the same.
result: Upscaled from 1 clients initially to 3 as the features was customizable based on requirements. Faster P2P process as single invoices can be created from multiple purchase orders.
challenges: Invoice reconciliation process to include matching with multiple PO instead of one.

title: Web App Development
description: Developed and delivered a mobile responsive web application to digitalize the end-to-end process of the NGO's paper-based system. This project helped the NGO with their Admission process, keeping student records as well as maintaining the studentâ€™s daily attendance. Tech stack - Django web Framework, MySQL, HTML, AJAX, CSS, JavaScript,and Bootstrap.
result: Increased the work efficiency of the NGO staff by 60%.
